item.description: [!TASK] Setting up the template Undo (Ctrl/Cmd+Z) to revert the activation of date and title variables Verify the template is inside the templates folder Verify the correct tag has been added in the tags field Add any extra metadata fields under the title Add any relevant headers Remove this callout block when finished all tasks
